mc.name: Telekinetic Bonds
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player discards a card, you may pay {1}{U}. If you do, you may tap or untap target permanent.
mc.printedText: Whenever a player discards a card from his or her hand, you may pay {1}{U}. If you do, tap or untap target permanent.
mc.flavorText:
"Nature's been fired. The oceans are under new management."
--Ambassador Laquatus

mc.name: Elephant Guide
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard, put a 3/3 green Elephant creature token into play.
mc.printedText:
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard, put a 3/3 green Elephant creature token into play.
mc.flavorText: Nature's strength outlives the strong.

mc.name: Quiet Speculation
mc.oracleText: Search target player's library for up to three cards with flashback and put them into that player's graveyard. Then the player shuffles his or her library.
mc.printedText: Search target player's library for up to three cards with flashback and put them into that player's graveyard. Then the player shuffles his or her library.
mc.flavorText:
"The best foresight is hindsight."
--Empress Llawan

mc.name: Balthor the Defiled
mc.oracleText:
Minion creatures get +1/+1.
{B}{B}{B}, Remove Balthor the Defiled from the game: Each player returns all black and all red creature cards from his or her graveyard to play.
mc.printedText:
All Minions get +1/+1.
{B}{B}{B}, Remove Balthor the Defiled from the game: Each player returns all black and all red creature cards from his or her graveyard to play.
mc.flavorText: He remembers enough of his life to weep for what he has lost.

mc.name: Aven Fogbringer
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Aven Fogbringer comes into play, return target land to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Aven Fogbringer comes into play, return target land to its owner's hand.
mc.flavorText: "I cover the land with blankets and it sleeps."

mc.name: Unquestioned Authority
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
When Unquestioned Authority comes into play, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has protection from creatures.
mc.printedText:
When Unquestioned Authority comes into play, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has protection from creatures.
mc.flavorText:
"Only the Ancestor should be revered."
--Mystic heretic

mc.name: Spellgorger Barbarian
mc.oracleText:
When Spellgorger Barbarian comes into play, discard a card at random.
When Spellgorger Barbarian leaves play, draw a card.
mc.printedText:
When Spellgorger Barbarian comes into play, discard a card at random from your hand.
When Spellgorger Barbarian leaves play, draw a card.
mc.flavorText: The epidemic insanity had a lasting effect on certain barbarians--but no one noticed.

mc.name: Wormfang Drake
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Wormfang Drake comes into play, sacrifice it unless you remove a creature you control other than Wormfang Drake from the game.
When Wormfang Drake leaves play, return the removed card to play under its owner's control.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Wormfang Drake comes into play, sacrifice it unless you remove a creature you control other than Wormfang Drake from the game.
When Wormfang Drake leaves play, return the removed card to play under its owner's control.

mc.name: Tunneler Wurm
mc.oracleText: Discard a card: Regenerate Tunneler Wurm.
mc.printedText: Discard a card from your hand: Regenerate Tunneler Wurm.
mc.flavorText: If an anurid's lucky, it'll find a warm tunnel for bedtime. If a wurm's lucky, it'll find a warm anurid for breakfast.

mc.name: Cephalid Constable
mc.oracleText: Whenever Cephalid Constable deals combat damage to a player, return up to that many target permanents that player controls to their owners' hands.
mc.printedText: Whenever Cephalid Constable deals combat damage to a player, return up to X target permanents that player controls to their owners' hands, where X is the damage it dealt to that player.
mc.flavorText: Cephalids don't police people. They police loyalties.

mc.name: Laquatus's Disdain
mc.oracleText:
Counter target spell played from a graveyard.

Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Counter target spell played from a graveyard.
Draw a card.
mc.flavorText: "The first time was amusing, but now you're getting tiresome."

mc.name: Swirling Sandstorm
mc.oracleText: Threshold - Swirling Sandstorm deals 5 damage to each creature without flying if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
mc.printedText: Threshold Swirling Sandstorm deals 5 damage to each creature without flying. (You have threshold if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.)
mc.flavorText: As dust swept out, vultures swept in.

mc.name: Lava Dart
mc.oracleText:
Lava Dart deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

Flashback-Sacrifice a Mountain. (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)
mc.printedText:
Lava Dart deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
Flashback--Sacrifice a mountain. (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)

mc.name: Flash of Insight
mc.oracleText:
Look at the top X cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library.

Flashback-{1}{U}, Remove X blue cards in your graveyard from the game. (You can't remove Flash of Insight to pay for its own flashback cost.)
mc.printedText:
Look at the top X cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library.
Flashback--{1}{U}, Remove X blue cards in your graveyard from the game. (You can't remove Flash of Insight to pay for its own flashback cost.)

mc.name: Breaking Point
mc.oracleText: Any player may have Breaking Point deal 6 damage to him or her. If no one does, destroy all creatures and they can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: Destroy all creatures unless a player has Breaking Point deal 6 damage to him or her. Creatures destroyed this way can't be regenerated.
mc.flavorText: "Enough"

mc.name: Ember Shot
mc.oracleText:
Ember Shot deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Ember Shot deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
Draw a card.
mc.flavorText: Dwarves bring poor coal to market, use good coal in their homes, and throw their best coal away.

mc.name: Exoskeletal Armor
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +X/+X, where X is the number of creature cards in all graveyards.
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature gets +X/+X, where X is the number of creature cards in all graveyards.
mc.flavorText:
"We use only what we need--but in times of strife, our need becomes great."
--Centaur warrior

mc.name: Guiltfeeder
mc.oracleText:
Fear
Whenever Guiltfeeder attacks and isn't blocked, defending player loses 1 life for each card in his or her graveyard.
mc.printedText:
Guiltfeeder can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.
Whenever Guiltfeeder attacks and isn't blocked, defending player loses 1 life for each card in his or her graveyard.

mc.name: Test of Endurance
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 50 or more life, you win the game.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 50 or more life, you win the game.
mc.flavorText:
"If we have learned nothing else, we have learned to survive."
--Mystic elder

mc.name: Scalpelexis
mc.oracleText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Whenever Scalpelexis deals combat damage to a player, that player removes the top four cards of his or her library from the game. If two or more of those cards have the same name, repeat this process.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever Scalpelexis deals combat damage to a player, that player removes the top four cards of his or her library from the game. If two or more of those cards have the same name, repeat this process.

mc.name: Sutured Ghoul
mc.oracleText:
Trample
As Sutured Ghoul comes into play, remove any number of creature cards in your graveyard from the game.
Sutured Ghoul's power is equal to the total power of the removed cards and its toughness is equal to their total toughness.
mc.printedText:
Trample
As Sutured Ghoul comes into play, remove any number of creature cards in your graveyard from the game.
Sutured Ghoul's power is equal to the total power of the removed cards and its toughness is equal to their total toughness. (A * on a card not in play is 0.)

mc.name: Krosan Verge
mc.oracleText:
Krosan Verge comes into play tapped.

{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Krosan Verge: Search your library for a Forest card and a Plains card and put them into play tapped. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText:
Krosan Verge comes into play tapped.
{T}: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Krosan Verge: Search your library for a forest card and a plains card and put them into play tapped. Then shuffle your library.

mc.name: Stitch Together
mc.oracleText:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Threshold - Return that card from your graveyard to play instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
mc.printedText:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Threshold Instead return that card from your graveyard to play. (You have threshold if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.)

mc.name: Epic Struggle
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control twenty or more creatures, you win the game.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control twenty or more creatures, you win the game.
mc.flavorText:
"If our foes will not listen to words, perhaps hooves and claws will make them take notice."
--Seton, centaur druid

mc.name: Anger
mc.oracleText:
Haste
As long as Anger is in your graveyard and you control a Mountain, creatures you control have haste.
mc.printedText:
Haste
As long as Anger is in your graveyard and you control a mountain, creatures you control have haste.
mc.flavorText:
"For its time as a mortal, Anger chose a shell of boiling rock."
--Scroll of Beginnings

mc.name: Valor
mc.oracleText:
First strike
As long as Valor is in your graveyard and you control a Plains, creatures you control have first strike.
mc.printedText:
First strike
As long as Valor is in your graveyard and you control a plains, creatures you control have first strike.
mc.flavorText:
"The cracks widened, the shell crumbled, and Valor spread throughout the land."
--Scroll of Beginnings

mc.name: Wonder
mc.oracleText:
Flying
As long as Wonder is in your graveyard and you control an Island, creatures you control have flying.
mc.printedText:
Flying
As long as Wonder is in your graveyard and you control an island, creatures you control have flying.
mc.flavorText:
"The awestruck birds gazed at Wonder. Slowly, timidly, they rose into the air."
--Scroll of Beginnings

mc.name: Brawn
mc.oracleText:
Trample
As long as Brawn is in your graveyard and you control a Forest, creatures you control have trample.
mc.printedText:
Trample
As long as Brawn is in your graveyard and you control a forest, creatures you control have trample.
mc.flavorText:
"--'I have arrived,' bellowed Brawn, and the plane shuddered."
--Scroll of Beginnings

mc.name: Filth
mc.oracleText:
Swampwalk
As long as Filth is in your graveyard and you control a Swamp, creatures you control have swampwalk.
mc.printedText:
Swampwalk
As long as Filth is in your graveyard and you control a swamp, creatures you control have swampwalk.
mc.flavorText:
"As the portal closed, Filth oozed through. The stench of evil followed it in."
--Scroll of Beginnings

mc.name: Ray of Revelation
mc.oracleText:
Destroy target enchantment.

Flashback {G} (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)
mc.printedText:
Destroy target enchantment.
Flashback {G} (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)
mc.flavorText: Webs of illusion unravel in the light of truth.

mc.name: Border Patrol
mc.oracleText: Vigilance
mc.printedText: Attacking doesn't cause Border Patrol to tap.
mc.flavorText:
"We have been victims of treachery, of the Cabal, and of our own ambitions. No more."
--Commander Eesha

mc.name: Seedtime
mc.oracleText:
Play Seedtime only during your turn.

Take an extra turn after this one if an opponent played a blue spell this turn.
mc.printedText:
Play Seedtime only during your turn.
Take an extra turn after this one if an opponent played a blue spell this turn.
mc.flavorText:
The hippo grows wings to fight the condor.
--Nantuko teaching

mc.name: Suntail Hawk
mc.oracleText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
mc.printedText: Flying
mc.flavorText:
"Our forebears once flew like this--carefree, needing nothing but a warm nest and a full belly. Our intellect may be more burden than blessing."
--Commander Eesha

mc.name: Lightning Surge
mc.oracleText:
Lightning Surge deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
Threshold - If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, instead Lightning Surge deals 6 damage to that creature or player and the damage can't be prevented.
Flashback {5}{R}{R} (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)
mc.printedText:
Lightning Surge deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
Threshold Instead Lightning Surge deals 6 damage to that creature or player and the damage can't be prevented.
Flashback {5}{R}{R} (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)

mc.name: Grizzly Fate
mc.oracleText:
Put two 2/2 green Bear creature tokens into play.
Threshold - Put four 2/2 green Bear creature tokens into play instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
Flashback {5}{G}{G} (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)
mc.printedText:
Put two 2/2 green Bear creature tokens into play.
Threshold Instead put four 2/2 green Bear creature tokens into play.
Flashback {5}{G}{G} (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)

mc.name: Flaring Pain
mc.oracleText:
Damage can't be prevented this turn.

Flashback {R} (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)
mc.printedText:
Damage can't be prevented this turn.
Flashback {R} (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)
mc.flavorText:
"I don't rub salt in wounds. I use sulfur."
--Matoc, lavamancer

mc.name: Prismatic Strands
mc.oracleText:
Prevent all damage that sources of the color of your choice would deal this turn.

Flashback-Tap an untapped white creature you control. (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)
mc.printedText:
Prevent all damage that sources of the color of your choice would deal this turn.
Flashback--Tap an untapped white creature you control. (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)

mc.name: Nomad Mythmaker
mc.oracleText: {W}, {T}: Put target Aura card in a graveyard into play attached to a creature you control. (You control that Aura.)
mc.printedText: {W}, {T}: Put target enchant creature card from a graveyard into play enchanting a creature you control. (You control that enchantment.)
mc.flavorText: Nomads weave tales thicker than tapestries.

mc.name: Spurnmage Advocate
mc.oracleText: {T}: Return two target cards in an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Destroy target attacking creature.
mc.printedText: {T}: Return two target cards in an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Destroy target attacking creature.
mc.flavorText: "Our unity humbles our foes."

mc.name: Ancestor's Chosen
mc.oracleText:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
When Ancestor's Chosen comes into play, you gain 1 life for each card in your graveyard.
mc.printedText:
First strike
When Ancestor's Chosen comes into play, you gain 1 life for each card in your graveyard.
mc.flavorText: Empowered by generations of strength.

mc.name: Forcemage Advocate
mc.oracleText: {T}: Return target card in an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
mc.printedText: {T}: Return target card in an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
mc.flavorText: "Our unity renews our strength."

mc.name: Nullmage Advocate
mc.oracleText: {T}: Return two target cards in an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
mc.printedText: {T}: Return two target cards in an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
mc.flavorText: "Our unity unmasks your deceit."

mc.name: Riftstone Portal
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

As long as Riftstone Portal is in your graveyard, lands you control have "{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool."
mc.printedText:
{T}: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool.
As long as Riftstone Portal is in your graveyard, lands you control have "{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool."

mc.name: Golden Wish
mc.oracleText: You may choose an artifact or enchantment card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Remove Golden Wish from the game.
mc.printedText: Choose an artifact or enchantment card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Remove Golden Wish from the game.
mc.flavorText: She wished for nobility, but not for a nation to honor it.

mc.name: Cunning Wish
mc.oracleText: You may choose an instant card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Remove Cunning Wish from the game.
mc.printedText: Choose an instant card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Remove Cunning Wish from the game.
mc.flavorText: He wished for knowledge, but not for the will to apply it.

mc.name: Nantuko Monastery
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
Threshold - {G}{W}: Nantuko Monastery becomes a 4/4 green and white Insect Monk creature with first strike until end of turn. It's still a land. Play this ability only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool.
Threshold {G}{W}: Nantuko Monastery becomes a 4/4 green and white creature with first strike until end of turn. It's still a land. (Play this ability only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.)

mc.name: Death Wish
mc.oracleText: You may choose a card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. You lose half your life, rounded up. Remove Death Wish from the game.
mc.printedText: Choose a card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. You lose half your life, rounded up. Remove Death Wish from the game.
mc.flavorText: He wished for power, but not for the longevity to abuse it.

mc.name: Burning Wish
mc.oracleText: You may choose a sorcery card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Remove Burning Wish from the game.
mc.printedText: Choose a sorcery card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Remove Burning Wish from the game.
mc.flavorText: She wished for a weapon, but not for the skill to wield it.

mc.name: Living Wish
mc.oracleText: You may choose a creature or land card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Remove Living Wish from the game.
mc.printedText: Choose a creature or land card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Remove Living Wish from the game.
mc.flavorText: He wished for growth, but not for a way to control it.

mc.name: Battlewise Aven
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Threshold - Battlewise Aven gets +1/+1 and has first strike as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Threshold Battlewise Aven gets +1/+1 and has first strike. (You have threshold as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.)
mc.flavorText: Experience is a good teacher, not a kind one.

mc.name: Masked Gorgon
mc.oracleText:
Green creatures and white creatures have protection from Gorgons.
Threshold - Masked Gorgon has protection from green and from white as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
mc.printedText:
Green creatures and white creatures have protection from Gorgons.
Threshold Masked Gorgon has protection from green and from white. (You have threshold as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.)

mc.name: Ironshell Beetle
mc.oracleText: When Ironshell Beetle comes into play, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
mc.printedText: When Ironshell Beetle comes into play, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
mc.flavorText:
"Why waste time creating weapons? Nature provides us with all we need."
--Centaur warrior

mc.name: Lead Astray
mc.oracleText: Tap up to two target creatures.
mc.printedText: Tap up to two target creatures.
mc.flavorText:
"Never underestimate our enemy's strength, brutality, . . . or stupidity."
--Commander Eesha

mc.name: Solitary Confinement
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Solitary Confinement unless you discard a card.
Skip your draw step.
You have shroud. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you.
mc.printedText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Solitary Confinement unless you discard a card from your hand.
Skip your draw step.
You can't be the target of spells or abilities.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you.

mc.name: Lost in Thought
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be played. Its controller may remove three cards in his or her graveyard from the game to ignore this ability until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be played. Its controller may remove three cards in his or her graveyard from the game to ignore this ability until end of turn.

mc.name: Mist of Stagnation
mc.oracleText:
Permanents don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses a permanent for each card in his or her graveyard, then untaps those permanents.
mc.printedText:
Permanents don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player untaps a permanent for each card in his or her graveyard.

mc.name: Cephalid Inkshrouder
mc.oracleText: Discard a card: Cephalid Inkshrouder gains shroud until end of turn and is unblockable this turn. (A permanent with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
mc.printedText: Discard a card from your hand: Cephalid Inkshrouder can't be the target of spells or abilities and is unblockable this turn.
mc.flavorText: Cephalids shrink from the harsh glare of scrutiny.

mc.name: Treacherous Vampire
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever Treacherous Vampire attacks or blocks, sacrifice it unless you remove a card in your graveyard from the game.
Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Treacherous Vampire gets +2/+2 and has "When Treacherous Vampire is put into a graveyard from play, you lose 6 life."
mc.printedText:
Flying
Whenever Treacherous Vampire attacks or blocks, sacrifice it unless you remove a card in your graveyard from the game.
Threshold Treacherous Vampire gets +2/+2 and has "When Treacherous Vampire is put into a graveyard from play, you lose 6 life."

mc.name: Cabal Therapy
mc.oracleText:
Name a nonland card. Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all cards with that name.
Flashback-Sacrifice a creature. (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)
mc.printedText:
Name a nonland card. Target player reveals his or her hand and discards from it all cards with that name.
Flashback--Sacrifice a creature. (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)

mc.name: Shaman's Trance
mc.oracleText: Until end of turn, other players can't play cards from their graveyards, and you may play cards from other players' graveyards as though they were in your graveyard.
mc.printedText: Until end of turn, other players can't play cards from their graveyards, and you may play cards from other players' graveyards as though they were in your graveyard.

mc.name: Grip of Amnesia
mc.oracleText:
Counter target spell unless its controller removes his or her graveyard from the game.

Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Counter target spell unless its controller removes his or her graveyard from the game.
Draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
"Would you abandon your past to save your future?"
--Ambassador Laquatus

mc.name: Wormfang Newt
mc.oracleText:
When Wormfang Newt comes into play, remove a land you control from the game.
When Wormfang Newt leaves play, return the removed card to play under its owner's control.
mc.printedText:
When Wormfang Newt comes into play, remove a land you control from the game.
When Wormfang Newt leaves play, return the removed card to play under its owner's control.
mc.flavorText: Spawned by mages emulating the insane.

mc.name: Wormfang Behemoth
mc.oracleText:
When Wormfang Behemoth comes into play, remove all cards in your hand from the game.
When Wormfang Behemoth leaves play, return the removed cards to their owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
When Wormfang Behemoth comes into play, remove all cards in your hand from the game.
When Wormfang Behemoth leaves play, return the removed cards to their owner's hand.

mc.name: Barbarian Bully
mc.oracleText: Discard a card at random: Barbarian Bully gets +2/+2 until end of turn unless a player has Barbarian Bully deal 4 damage to him or her. Play this ability only once each turn.
mc.printedText: Discard a card at random from your hand: Barbarian Bully gets +2/+2 until end of turn unless a player has Barbarian Bully deal 4 damage to him or her. Play this ability only once each turn.
mc.flavorText: "Out of my way"

mc.name: Glory
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{2}{W}: Creatures you control gain protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Play this ability only if Glory is in your graveyard.
mc.printedText:
Flying
{2}{W}: Creatures you control gain protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Play this ability only if Glory is in your graveyard.
mc.flavorText:
"Glory was gone; Glory was everywhere."
--Scroll of Beginnings

mc.name: Web of Inertia
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of each opponent's combat phase, that player may remove a card in his or her graveyard from the game. If the player doesn't, creatures he or she controls can't attack you this turn.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of each opponent's combat phase, that player may remove a card in his or her graveyard from the game. If the player doesn't, creatures he or she controls can't attack you this turn.
mc.flavorText: Cephalids specialize in lose-lose situations.

mc.name: Genesis
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if Genesis is in your graveyard, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, if Genesis is in your graveyard, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.flavorText:
"First through the Riftstone was Genesis--and the world was lifeless no more."
--Scroll of Beginnings

mc.name: Aven Warcraft
mc.oracleText:
Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.
Threshold - If seven or more cards are in your graveyard, creatures you control also gain protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.
Threshold Creatures you control also gain protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (You have threshold if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.)

mc.name: Funeral Pyre
mc.oracleText: Remove target card in a graveyard from the game. Its owner puts a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying into play.
mc.printedText: Remove target card in a graveyard from the game. Its owner puts a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying into play.
mc.flavorText:
"Raze the body. Raise the soul."
--Mystic elder

mc.name: Phantom Nomad
mc.oracleText:
Phantom Nomad comes into play with two +1/+1 counters on it.
If damage would be dealt to Phantom Nomad, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Nomad.
mc.printedText:
Phantom Nomad comes into play with two +1/+1 counters on it.
If damage would be dealt to Phantom Nomad, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Nomad.

mc.name: Selfless Exorcist
mc.oracleText: {T}: Remove target creature card in a graveyard from the game. That card deals damage equal to its power to Selfless Exorcist.
mc.printedText: {T}: Remove target creature card in a graveyard from the game. That card deals damage equal to its power to Selfless Exorcist. (A * on a card not in play is 0.)

mc.name: Spirit Cairn
mc.oracleText: Whenever a player discards a card, you may pay {W}. If you do, put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying into play.
mc.printedText: Whenever a player discards a card from his or her hand, you may pay {W}. If you do, put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying into play.
mc.flavorText: It marks the border between here and hereafter.

mc.name: Goretusk Firebeast
mc.oracleText: When Goretusk Firebeast comes into play, it deals 4 damage to target player.
mc.printedText: When Goretusk Firebeast comes into play, it deals 4 damage to target player.
mc.flavorText: As a youth, Kamahl took one for a pet. His hair has yet to grow back.

mc.name: Wormfang Crab
mc.oracleText:
Wormfang Crab is unblockable.
When Wormfang Crab comes into play, an opponent chooses a permanent you control other than Wormfang Crab and removes it from the game.
When Wormfang Crab leaves play, return the removed card to play under its owner's control.
mc.printedText:
Wormfang Crab is unblockable.
When Wormfang Crab comes into play, an opponent chooses a permanent you control and removes it from the game.
When Wormfang Crab leaves play, return the removed card to play under its owner's control.

Flying
When Wormfang Manta comes into play, you skip your next turn.

mc.name: Soulgorger Orgg

Trample
When Soulgorger Orgg comes into play, you lose all but 1 life.
When Soulgorger Orgg leaves play, you gain life equal to the life you lost when it came into play.

Trample
When Soulgorger Orgg comes into play, you lose all but 1 life.

mc.name: Dwarven Driller
mc.oracleText: {T}: Destroy target land unless its controller has Dwarven Driller deal 2 damage to him or her.
mc.printedText: {T}: Destroy target land unless its controller has Dwarven Driller deal 2 damage to him or her.
mc.flavorText:
"Drill the planet, it's no trouble:
Mining granite, making rubble."
--Dwarven drilling song

mc.name: Wormfang Turtle
mc.oracleText:
When Wormfang Turtle comes into play, remove a land you control from the game.
When Wormfang Turtle leaves play, return the removed card to play under its owner's control.
mc.printedText:
When Wormfang Turtle comes into play, remove a land you control from the game.
When Wormfang Turtle leaves play, return the removed card to play under its owner's control.
mc.flavorText: Chainer's admirers keep his dreams alive.

mc.name: Chastise
mc.oracleText: Destroy target attacking creature. You gain life equal to its power.
mc.printedText: Destroy target attacking creature. You gain life equal to its power.
mc.flavorText:
"Why do we pray to the Ancestor? Because She listens."
--Mystic elder

mc.name: Worldgorger Dragon
mc.oracleText:
Flying, trample
When Worldgorger Dragon comes into play, remove all other permanents you control from the game.
When Worldgorger Dragon leaves play, return the removed cards to play under their owners' control.
mc.printedText:
Flying, trample
When Worldgorger Dragon comes into play, remove all other permanents you control from the game.
When Worldgorger Dragon leaves play, return the removed cards to play under their owners' control.

mc.name: Mirari's Wake
mc.oracleText:
Creatures you control get +1/+1.

Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana to your mana pool of any type that land produced.
mc.printedText:
Creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana to your mana pool of any type that land produced.
mc.flavorText: The land drank power from the Mirari as though it had thirsted forever.

mc.name: Anurid Brushhopper
mc.oracleText: Discard two cards: Remove Anurid Brushhopper from the game. Return it to play under its owner's control at end of turn.
mc.printedText: Discard two cards from your hand: Remove Anurid Brushhopper from the game. Return it to play under its owner's control at end of turn.
mc.flavorText: It's so tough it can frighten itself into hiding.

mc.name: Sylvan Safekeeper
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice a land: Target creature you control gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a land: Target creature you control can't be the target of spells or abilities this turn.
mc.flavorText:
"How could someone so small cause so much trouble?"
--Nomad sentry

mc.name: Shieldmage Advocate
mc.oracleText: {T}: Return target card in an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn by a source of your choice.
mc.printedText: {T}: Return target card in an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn by a source of your choice.
mc.flavorText: "Our unity conquers all fears."

mc.name: Trained Pronghorn
mc.oracleText: Discard a card: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Trained Pronghorn this turn.
mc.printedText: Discard a card from your hand: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Trained Pronghorn this turn.
mc.flavorText:
"The desert asked the Ancestor for children, and the antelope were born."
--Nomad myth

mc.name: Krosan Wayfarer
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice Krosan Wayfarer: You may put a land card from your hand into play.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice Krosan Wayfarer: Put a land card from your hand into play.
mc.flavorText:
"The Krosan Forest lives, and druids are its seeds."
--Seton, centaur druid

mc.name: Folk Medicine

You gain 1 life for each creature you control.

mc.printedText:
You gain 1 life for each creature you control.
Flashback {1}{W} (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)

mc.printedText: Tap an untapped Dwarf you control: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: His battle cry unleashes an avalanche of dwarves.

mc.name: Defy Gravity
mc.oracleText:

mc.printedText:
Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
Flashback {U} (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)

mc.oracleText:
Put two 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying into play.

mc.printedText:

Flashback--Tap three untapped white creatures you control. (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)

mc.name: Earsplitting Rats
mc.oracleText:
When Earsplitting Rats comes into play, each player discards a card.
Discard a card: Regenerate Earsplitting Rats.
mc.printedText:
When Earsplitting Rats comes into play, each player discards a card from his or her hand.
Discard a card from your hand: Regenerate Earsplitting Rats.
mc.flavorText: Rats come in one amount: too many.

mc.name: Liberated Dwarf
mc.oracleText: {R}, Sacrifice Liberated Dwarf: Target green creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {R}, Sacrifice Liberated Dwarf: Target green creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Freed from their chains, these dwarves are bound only by honor.

mc.name: Infectious Rage
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/-1.
When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard, choose a creature at random Infectious Rage can enchant. Return Infectious Rage to play attached to that creature.
mc.printedText:
Enchanted creature gets +2/-1.
When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard, choose a creature at random Infectious Rage can enchant. Return Infectious Rage to play enchanting that creature.

mc.name: Planar Chaos
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, sacrifice Planar Chaos.

Whenever a player plays a spell, that player flips a coin. If he or she loses the flip, counter that spell.
mc.printedText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, sacrifice Planar Chaos.
Whenever a player plays a spell, that player flips a coin. If he or she loses the flip, counter that spell.

mc.name: Soulcatchers' Aerie
mc.oracleText:
Whenever a Bird is put into your graveyard from play, put a feather counter on Soulcatchers' Aerie.
Bird creatures get +1/+1 for each feather counter on Soulcatchers' Aerie.
mc.printedText:
Whenever a Bird is put into your graveyard from play, put a feather counter on Soulcatchers' Aerie.
All Birds get +1/+1 for each feather counter on Soulcatchers' Aerie.

mc.name: Sudden Strength
mc.oracleText:
Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
mc.flavorText: The Mirari's magic transformed the Krosan Forest--and its inhabitants.

mc.name: Grave Consequences
mc.oracleText:
Each player may remove any number of cards in his or her graveyard from the game. Then each player loses 1 life for each card in his or her graveyard.

Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Each player may remove any number of cards in his or her graveyard from the game. Then each player loses 1 life for each card in his or her graveyard.
Draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
"You call that a nightmare?"
--Braids, dementia summoner

mc.name: Hunting Grounds
mc.oracleText: Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Hunting Grounds has "Whenever an opponent plays a spell, you may put a creature card from your hand into play."
mc.printedText: Threshold Whenever an opponent plays a spell, you may put a creature card from your hand into play. (You have threshold as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.)
mc.flavorText: In the heavy hush of Krosa, drawing on mana is like ringing a dinner bell.

mc.name: Keep Watch
mc.oracleText: Draw a card for each attacking creature.
mc.printedText: Draw a card for each attacking creature.
mc.flavorText: "I see their moral dilemmas. I see their raw courage. I see their self-sacrifice. I see our victory."

mc.name: Spelljack
mc.oracleText: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, remove it from the game instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. As long as it remains removed from the game, you may play it without paying its mana cost. (If it has X in its mana cost, X is 0.)
mc.printedText: Counter target spell. If it's countered this way, remove it from the game instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. As long as it remains removed from the game, you may play it as though it were in your hand without paying its mana cost. If it has X in its mana cost, X is 0.

mc.name: Crush of Wurms
mc.oracleText:
Put three 6/6 green Wurm creature tokens into play.

Flashback {9}{G}{G}{G} (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)
mc.printedText:
Put three 6/6 green Wurm creature tokens into play.
Flashback {9}{G}{G}{G} (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)

mc.name: Morality Shift
mc.oracleText: Exchange your graveyard and library. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: Exchange your graveyard and library. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: The mind sings, though at times it sings a dirge.

mc.name: Erhnam Djinn
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, target non-Wall creature an opponent controls gains forestwalk until your next upkeep.
mc.printedText: At the beginning of your upkeep, target non-Wall creature an opponent controls gains forestwalk until your next upkeep.
mc.flavorText: He provides a safe path to nowhere.

mc.name: Pulsemage Advocate
mc.oracleText: {T}: Return three target cards in an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Return target creature card from your graveyard to play.
mc.printedText: {T}: Return three target cards in an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Return target creature card from your graveyard to play.
mc.flavorText: "Our unity revives our hopes."

mc.name: Book Burning
mc.oracleText: Any player may have Book Burning deal 6 damage to him or her. If no one does, put the top six cards of target player's library into his or her graveyard.
mc.printedText: Unless a player has Book Burning deal 6 damage to him or her, put the top six cards of target player's library into his or her graveyard.
mc.flavorText: The wizard's spellbook was full of burning questions.

mc.name: Commander Eesha
mc.oracleText: Flying, protection from creatures
mc.printedText: Flying, protection from creatures
mc.flavorText: "War glides on the simplest updrafts while peace struggles against hurricane winds. It is the way of the world. It must change."

mc.name: Vigilant Sentry
mc.oracleText: Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Vigilant Sentry gets +1/+1 and has "{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn."
mc.printedText: Threshold Vigilant Sentry gets +1/+1 and has "{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn." (You have threshold as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.)

mc.name: Silver Seraph
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Threshold - Other creatures you control get +2/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Threshold Other creatures you control get +2/+2. (You have threshold as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.)
mc.flavorText: A symbol of hope for hopeless times.

mc.name: Treacherous Werewolf
mc.oracleText: Threshold - As long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard, Treacherous Werewolf gets +2/+2 and has "When Treacherous Werewolf is put into a graveyard from play, you lose 4 life."
mc.printedText: Threshold Treacherous Werewolf gets +2/+2 and has "When Treacherous Werewolf is put into a graveyard from play, you lose 4 life." (You have threshold as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.)

mc.name: Browbeat
mc.oracleText: Any player may have Browbeat deal 5 damage to him or her. If no one does, target player draws three cards.
mc.printedText: Unless a player has Browbeat deal 5 damage to him or her, target player draws three cards.
mc.flavorText:
"Even the threat of power has power."
--Jeska, warrior adept

mc.name: Anurid Barkripper
mc.oracleText: Threshold - Anurid Barkripper gets +2/+2 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
mc.printedText: Threshold Anurid Barkripper gets +2/+2. (You have threshold as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.)
mc.flavorText: When it croaks, so do you.

mc.name: Battlefield Scrounger
mc.oracleText: Threshold - Put three cards from your graveyard on the bottom of your library: Battlefield Scrounger gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Play this ability only once each turn, and only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
mc.printedText: Threshold Put three cards from your graveyard on the bottom of your library: Battlefield Scrounger gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Play this ability only once each turn. (Play this ability only if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.)

mc.name: Giant Warthog
mc.oracleText: Trample
mc.printedText: Trample
mc.flavorText:
"When the Ancestor saw the cruelty her human children were capable of, Her fury shook the world. From this outburst sprang the warthogs."
--Nomad myth

mc.name: Krosan Reclamation
mc.oracleText:
Target player shuffles up to two target cards from his or her graveyard into his or her library.

Target player shuffles up to two target cards from his or her graveyard into his or her library.

mc.name: Mental Note
mc.oracleText:
Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.

Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.
Draw a card.
mc.flavorText: Some minds are more open than others.

mc.name: Hapless Researcher
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice Hapless Researcher: Draw a card, then discard a card.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice Hapless Researcher: Draw a card, then discard a card from your hand.
mc.flavorText: Scholars possess such lofty knowledge that it shouldn't be surprising when they fall.

mc.name: Dwarven Scorcher
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice Dwarven Scorcher: Dwarven Scorcher deals 1 damage to target creature unless that creature's controller has Dwarven Scorcher deal 2 damage to him or her.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice Dwarven Scorcher: Dwarven Scorcher deals 1 damage to target creature unless that creature's controller has Dwarven Scorcher deal 2 damage to him or her.
mc.flavorText: Barbarians invented the blaze of glory. Dwarves perfected it.

mc.name: Cabal Trainee
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice Cabal Trainee: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice Cabal Trainee: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Ah, a faceshredder. Very rare. Nearly unstoppable. Good luck"
--Cabal instructor

mc.name: Benevolent Bodyguard
mc.oracleText: Sacrifice Benevolent Bodyguard: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice Benevolent Bodyguard: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "My destiny is to save others so their destinies may be achieved."

mc.name: Swelter
mc.oracleText: Swelter deals 2 damage to each of two target creatures.
mc.printedText: Swelter deals 2 damage to each of two target creatures.
mc.flavorText: No circle has a beginning, but many have foreseeable ends.

mc.name: Venomous Vines
mc.oracleText: Destroy target enchanted permanent.
mc.printedText: Destroy target enchanted permanent.
mc.flavorText:
"True strength comes from within. The false promise of unnatural power only incurs Krosa's wrath."
--Seton, centaur druid

mc.name: Canopy Claws
mc.oracleText:
Target creature loses flying until end of turn.

Flashback {G} (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)
mc.printedText:
Target creature loses flying until end of turn.
Flashback {G} (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)

mc.name: Harvester Druid
mc.oracleText: {T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any color that a land you control could produce.
mc.printedText: {T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any color that a land you control could produce.
mc.flavorText: "In the end, the same soil lies atop the field, within the mountain, and under the sea."

mc.name: Rats' Feast
mc.oracleText: Remove X target cards in a single graveyard from the game.
mc.printedText: Remove X target cards in a single graveyard from the game.
mc.flavorText:
"That does it--I quit"
--Cabal grave robber

mc.name: Mirror Wall
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{W}: Mirror Wall can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
mc.printedText:
(Walls can't attack.)
{W}: Mirror Wall may attack this turn as though it weren't a Wall.
mc.flavorText:
"Breaking it would be about four hundred years bad luck."
--Nomad sentry

mc.name: Envelop
mc.oracleText: Counter target sorcery spell.
mc.printedText: Counter target sorcery spell.
mc.flavorText:
"What you made will be unmade. What you learned will be unlearned. And when you're done, you will be undone."
--Ambassador Laquatus

mc.name: Toxic Stench

Target nonblack creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

Enchant creature

mc.printedText: Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't attack.
mc.flavorText:
"Power often costs too high a price."

mc.printedText: Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature or player."

mc.name: Guided Strike
mc.oracleText:
Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
Draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
"May the Ancestor strengthen my hand and guide my blade."
--Nomad war prayer

mc.name: Jeska, Warrior Adept
mc.oracleText:
First strike, haste
{T}: Jeska, Warrior Adept deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText:
First strike, haste
{T}: Jeska, Warrior Adept deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.flavorText: "My brother and I both come from Balthor's forge. Kamahl has a temper of fire. I have a temper of steel."

mc.name: Anurid Swarmsnapper

Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
{1}{G}: Anurid Swarmsnapper can block an additional creature this turn.
mc.printedText:
Anurid Swarmsnapper may block as though it had flying.
{1}{G}: Anurid Swarmsnapper may block an additional creature this turn.
mc.flavorText: Anurids have the problem of airborne invaders licked.

mc.name: Serene Sunset
mc.oracleText: Prevent all combat damage X target creatures would deal this turn.
mc.printedText: Prevent all combat damage X target creatures would deal this turn.
mc.flavorText: The armies paused, silent, as the warriors reflected on the sunsets of their youth.

mc.name: Thriss, Nantuko Primus
mc.oracleText: {G}, {T}: Target creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {G}, {T}: Target creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "When you live for others, you live for yourself."

mc.name: Nantuko Tracer
mc.oracleText: When Nantuko Tracer comes into play, you may put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.
mc.printedText: When Nantuko Tracer comes into play, you may put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.
mc.flavorText:
Your past is a map to where you will go.
--Nantuko teaching

mc.name: Phantom Nishoba
mc.oracleText:
Trample, lifelink (Whenever this creature deals damage, you gain that much life.)
Phantom Nishoba comes into play with seven +1/+1 counters on it.
If damage would be dealt to Phantom Nishoba, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Nishoba.
mc.printedText:
Trample
Phantom Nishoba comes into play with seven +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever Phantom Nishoba deals damage, you gain that much life.
If damage would be dealt to Phantom Nishoba, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Nishoba.

mc.name: Centaur Rootcaster
mc.oracleText: Whenever Centaur Rootcaster deals combat damage to a player, you may search your library for a basic land card and put that card into play tapped. If you do, shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: Whenever Centaur Rootcaster deals combat damage to a player, you may search your library for a basic land card and put that card into play tapped. If you do, shuffle your library.
